about_the_game:
The answer is hidden in plain sight, you just need to ask the right questions.

Vaudeville is a groundbreaking, narrative-driven detective game that immerses you in the heart of Europe, in a bustling city renowned for its captivating charm. As the famed private investigator, Detective Martini, use your wit and intuition to uncover the intricate secrets lurking within this city's vibrant streets and shadowy corners.

In Vaudeville, you're thrown into a complex web of murder, deceit, and intrigue. And the innovation doesn't stop there.

Vaudeville uses advanced AI technology to create dialogues in real-time. You can interact with the city's intriguing inhabitants using natural language, either by typing or talking into the microphone. Every conversation, every interaction, is unique to your game, offering an unrivalled level of immersion.

Investigate the brutal murders of three individuals, each with their own harrowing story. As you explore, you'll encounter a diverse cast of characters, each with their own secrets to hide. From the enigmatic lion tamer, Monsieur Saxabar, the beguiling burlesque dancer, Marina H, the secretive widow, Mrs Potter, to the arrogant nobleman, Count Gravesen - everyone is a suspect.

Explore exquisite locales, from the enchanting Cabane Violette, the chaotic Circus Saxabar, the eerily beautiful Gravesen Manor, to the mysterious wilderness of the Blackwoods. Collect clues and engage in gripping dialogues to unveil the truth.

Step into Vaudeville, a world where art and music conceal a tale of murder and deceit.

The truth is just a conversation away. Can you solve the mystery before it's too late?

::: THIS GAME REQUIRES AN INTERNET CONNECTION TO PLAY :::

DISCLAIMER

Use of Third-Party Service for Interactive AI-Driven NPCs in Vaudeville

Please read this notice carefully before engaging with the interactive AI-driven Non-Player Characters (NPCs) in Vaudeville.

In Vaudeville, developed by Bumblebee Studios and published by BBS Games AB, we utilize a third-party service provided by Inworld AI to enhance your gaming experience with interactive AI-driven NPCs. This involves processing the information you input during gameplay to generate dynamic NPC dialogues.

Data Handling and Privacy:
No Personal Data Collection by Bumblebee Studios and BBS Games AB. We do not collect any personal data from our players. All inputs are directly sent to Inworld AI's API for processing.

Inworld AI's Privacy and Safety Policies: For information on how Inworld AI handles and protects your data, please refer to their Privacy Policy and their commitment to safety

Limitation of Responsibility:
Bumblebee Studios and BBS Games AB are not responsible for the data usage by Inworld AI. We do not store, sell, or utilize any player data processed by Inworld AI.

Cautionary Advice to Players:
We strongly urge all players to refrain from inputting sensitive, personal, or financial information during interactions with NPCs in Vaudeville. The game is designed for entertainment, and any sensitive information shared during gameplay could be processed by the third-party service, beyond the control of Bumblebee Studios and BBS Games AB.

By engaging with the AI-driven NPCs in Vaudeville, you acknowledge and consent to the processing of your inputs by Inworld AI as per their policies. You also understand the limits of our responsibility regarding data usage.

Thank you for playing Vaudeville and for your attention to this important information.
